welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kaufungen, Germany! This charming city is known for its beautiful landscapes, rich history, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kaufungen has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kassel-Calden Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Kassel-Calden Airport, mainly used for charter and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fritzlar Airbase Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Fritzlar Airbase Airport is used for military operations and personnel.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.
